text: Padamsen Chaudhary is an Indian politician. He was elected to the Lok Sabha, the lower house of the Parliament of India as a member of the Bharatiya Janata Party. ==References== ==External links== * Official biographical sketch in Parliament of India website Category:1955 births Category:living people Category:Lok Sabha members from Uttar Pradesh Category:11th Lok Sabha members Category:13th Lok Sabha members Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Uttar Pradesh
title: Padamsen Chaudhary
